original_definition: 'electric portable local space heater' means an electric local space heater which is not an electric fixed local space heater, electric storage local space heater, electric underfloor local space heater, electric radiant local space heater, electric visibly glowing local space heater or slave heater;
generated_definition: 'electric portable local space heater' means an electric device designed to provide heat to a limited area, typically used in homes, offices, or other enclosed spaces, and can be easily moved from one location to another.
